comment.author: 73654547@N03
comment._content: I remember him! He was one heck of a good guy. My family lived on the next ranch down called the PL Ranch. Pat Johnson's ranch was the next one down from us. I caught my biggest fish ever, a 23-1/2" brown trout out of one of his ponds while fishing with a good friend of mine who's family lived and worked for the Oldlands.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Thanks for sharing your memories with us, remmons1966!

Mary
US National Archives
